channel.title: Couple questions about homes/construction
channel.description:
Ok here's the things I wanna ask about homes and construction
First what's the coords to the normal home place (like where would you make you're home in regular RS) Can you please give coords for it so i can start... Thanks!!!
How would you create a home [b]would it be by adding objects or adding construction skills[/b]
How do you add construction like construct a bank booth?
THANKS

item.title: Couple questions about homes/construction
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

I think in order to get the home from runescape you have to add it to your client, don’t think there is one added already:\

Read full topic
